text: Charles Gray (born Donald Marshall Gray; 28 August 1928 â€“ 7 March 2000) was an English actor. He was well known for roles such as Ernst Stavro Blofeld in the James Bond movie Diamonds Are Forever and Dikko Henderson in You Only Live Twice. Gray died on 7 March 2000 at a London hospital from cancer of unknown primary origin at the age of 71. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Hampshire Category:Cancer deaths in London
title: Charles Gray
